Table.Name: sage_lmcMips160Source
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the SAGE LMC MIPS 160 μm catalogue

Column.Name: sourceCatalog
Column.Description: Character string identifier for source catalogue

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Character string identifier for epoch of source

Column.Name: conf160
Column.Description: Confusion Flag for band 160, currently unused

Column.Name: flag160
Column.Description: How many times a source was observed by different AORs in a single epoch

Column.Name: correlation160
Column.Description: Correlation describes how like the input PSF each point source is

Column.Name: mmmNsky160
Column.Description: Number of points used to determine the sky values for mmmSkymode160, mmmSigma160 and mmmSkew160

Column.Name: mmmSigma160
Column.Description: Scalar giving standard deviation of the peak in the sky histogram

Column.Name: mmmSkew160
Column.Description: Scalar giving skewness of the peak in the sky histogram

Column.Name: mmmSkymode160
Column.Description: Scalar giving estimated mode of the sky values

Column.Name: averageCoverage160
Column.Description: The average coverage (# of independent observations per pixel)

Column.Name: versionNo
Column.Description: Version number assigned by MIPS/IRAC pipeline team

Column.Name: versionDate
Column.Description: Date catalogue was produced in the following format, "mon dd yyyy", "Dec 5 2007"

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: 20-deep hierachical triangular mesh ID of this source

Table.Name: sage_lmcIracSource
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the SAGE LMC IRAC catalogue

Column.Name: sourceCatalog
Column.Description: Character string identifier for source catalogue

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Character string identifier for epoch of source

Column.Name: rms_f3_6
Column.Description: deviation of detectors from the final flux of each source for band 3.6

Column.Name: rms_f4_5
Column.Description: deviation of detectors from the final flux of each source for band 4.5

Column.Name: rms_f5_8
Column.Description: deviation of detectors from the final flux of each source for band 5.8

Column.Name: rms_f8_0
Column.Description: deviation of detectors from the final flux of each source for band 8.0

Column.Name: n3_6
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 3.6

Column.Name: n4_5
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 4.5

Column.Name: n5_8
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 5.8

Column.Name: n8_0
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 8.0

Column.Name: sqfJ
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band J

Column.Name: sqfH
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band H

Column.Name: sqfK
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band K

Column.Name: mf3_6
Column.Description: Flux calc method for flag for band 3.6

Column.Name: mf4_5
Column.Description: Flux calc method for flag for band 4.5

Column.Name: mf5_8
Column.Description: Flux calc method for flag for band 5.8

Column.Name: mf8_0
Column.Description: Flux calc method for flag for band 8.0

Column.Name: versionNo
Column.Description: Version number assigned by MIPS/IRAC pipeline team

Column.Name: versionDate
Column.Description: Date catalogue was produced in the following format, "mon dd yyyy", "Dec 5 2007"

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: 20-deep hierachical triangular mesh ID of this source

Table.Name: sage_lmcMips24Source
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the SAGE LMC MIPS 24 μm catalogue

Column.Name: sourceCatalog
Column.Description: Character string identifier for source catalogue

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Character string identifier for epoch of source

Column.Name: conf24
Column.Description: Confusion Flag for band 24, currently unused

Column.Name: flag24
Column.Description: How many times a source was observed by different AORs in a single epoch

Column.Name: correlation24
Column.Description: Correlation describes how like the input PSF each point source is

Column.Name: mmmNsky24
Column.Description: Number of points used to determine the sky values for mmmSkymode24, mmmSigma24 and mmmSkew24

Column.Name: mmmSigma24
Column.Description: Scalar giving standard deviation of the peak in the sky histogram

Column.Name: mmmSkew24
Column.Description: Scalar giving skewness of the peak in the sky histogram

Column.Name: mmmSkymode24
Column.Description: Scalar giving estimated mode of the sky values

Column.Name: AORNumber24
Column.Description: Request key for the 1st AOR within which the source appears

Column.Name: averageCoverage24
Column.Description: The average coverage (# of independent observations per pixel)

Column.Name: versionNo
Column.Description: Version number assigned by MIPS/IRAC pipeline team

Column.Name: versionDate
Column.Description: Date catalogue was produced in the following format, "mon dd yyyy", "Dec 5 2007"

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: 20-deep hierachical triangular mesh ID of this source

Table.Name: spitzer_smcSource
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the SPITZER Survey of the SMC catalogue

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Table.Name: sage_lmcMips70Source
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the SAGE LMC MIPS 70 μm catalogue

Column.Name: sourceCatalog
Column.Description: Character string identifier for source catalogue

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Character string identifier for epoch of source

Column.Name: conf70
Column.Description: Confusion Flag for band 70, currently unused

Column.Name: flag70
Column.Description: How many times a source was observed by different AORs in a single epoch

Column.Name: correlation70
Column.Description: Correlation describes how like the input PSF each point source is

Column.Name: mmmNsky70
Column.Description: Number of points used to determine the sky values for mmmSkymode70, mmmSigma70 and mmmSkew70

Column.Name: mmmSigma70
Column.Description: Scalar giving standard deviation of the peak in the sky histogram

Column.Name: mmmSkew70
Column.Description: Scalar giving skewness of the peak in the sky histogram

Column.Name: mmmSkymode70
Column.Description: Scalar giving estimated mode of the sky values

Column.Name: averageCoverage70
Column.Description: The average coverage (# of independent observations per pixel)

Column.Name: versionNo
Column.Description: Version number assigned by MIPS/IRAC pipeline team

Column.Name: versionDate
Column.Description: Date catalogue was produced in the following format, "mon dd yyyy", "Dec 5 2007"

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of unit vector to this source

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: 20-deep hierachical triangular mesh ID of this source

Table.Name: sage_smcIRACv1_5Source
Table.Description: Contains the data from the SAGE-SMC IRAC Combined Epoch Catalog v1.5

Column.Name: globalSourceID
Column.Description: Unique identification number of each source in the catalog

Column.Name: sourceCatalog
Column.Description: Character string identifier for source catalog

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Character string identifier for the epoch of the observation of the source, i.e. "epoch 1", "epoch 2", "epoch 1+2",...

Column.Name: designation
Column.Description: SAGE source designation name SSTISAGE1C JHHMMSS.SS+-DDMMSS.S Designation is: SST = Spitzer Space Telescope; I = IRAC; 1 = epoch 1 / 2=epoch 2 / nothing if epoch 1+2; C = highly reliable Catalog; A = more complete Archive; J = 2000.0 epoch; HHMMSS.SS Right ascension (hr, min, sec) of source; sDDMMSS.S Declination (deg, min, sec) of source.

Column.Name: tmass_cntr
Column.Description: Unique identification number (counter) for the 2MASS source from the 2MASS All-Sky point source catalog (PSC).

Column.Name: closeFlag
Column.Description: Close source flag: 0 no sources in the Archive within 3" of the source; 1 sources in the Archive between 2.5" and 3" of the source; 2 sources in the Archive between 2.0" and 2.5" of the source; 3 sources in the Archive between 1.5" and 2.0" of the source; 4 sources in the Archive between 1.0" and 1.5" of the source; 5 sources in the Archive between 0.5" and 1.0" of the source; 6 sources in the Archive within 0.5" of the source.

Column.Name: dmagJ
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC J band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: dmagH
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC H band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: dmagK
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC K band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: dfluxJ
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC J band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: dfluxH
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC H band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: dfluxK
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC K band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: rms_f3_6
Column.Description: rms deviation of the individual detections from the final flux of each source for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1)

Column.Name: rms_f4_5
Column.Description: rms deviation of the individual detections from the final flux of each source for 4.5um IRAC (Band 2)

Column.Name: rms_f5_8
Column.Description: rms deviation of the individual detections from the final flux of each source for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3)

Column.Name: rms_f8_0
Column.Description: rms deviation of the individual detections from the final flux of each source for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4)

Column.Name: sky3_6
Column.Description: Local sky background for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_photometry_v1.0.pdf">Appendix B of GLIMPSE Photometry (v1.0) document</a>.

Column.Name: sky4_5
Column.Description: Local sky background for 4.5um IRAC (Band 2). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_photometry_v1.0.pdf">Appendix B of GLIMPSE Photometry (v1.0) document</a>.

Column.Name: sky5_8
Column.Description: Local sky background for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_photometry_v1.0.pdf">Appendix B of GLIMPSE Photometry (v1.0) document</a>.

Column.Name: sky8_0
Column.Description: Local sky background for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_photometry_v1.0.pdf">Appendix B of GLIMPSE Photometry (v1.0) document</a>.

Column.Name: srcDensity3_6
Column.Description: Local source density for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_dataprod_v1.5.pdf">section 4.1 of GLIMPSE Data Products (v1.5) document</a>.

Column.Name: srcDensity4_5
Column.Description: Local source density for 4.5um IRAC (Band 2). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_dataprod_v1.5.pdf">section 4.1 of GLIMPSE Data Products (v1.5) document</a>.

Column.Name: srcDensity5_8
Column.Description: Local source density for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_dataprod_v1.5.pdf">section 4.1 of GLIMPSE Data Products (v1.5) document</a>.

Column.Name: srcDensity8_0
Column.Description: Local source density for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4). See <a href="http://www.astro.wisc.edu/glimpse/glimpse_dataprod_v1.5.pdf">section 4.1 of GLIMPSE Data Products (v1.5) document</a>.

Column.Name: n3_6
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1)

Column.Name: n4_5
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 4.5 um IRAC (Band 2)

Column.Name: n5_8
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3)

Column.Name: n8_0
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4)

Column.Name: sqfJ
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC J Band Source Quality Flag (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: sqfH
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC H Band Source Quality Flag (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: sqfK
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC Ks Band Source Quality Flag (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: sqf3_6
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: sqf4_5
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for 4.5um IRAC (Band 2) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: sqf5_8
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: sqf8_0
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote1"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 1</a>)

Column.Name: mf3_6
Column.Description: Flux calculation method flag 3.6um IRAC (Band 1) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote2"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 2</a>)

Column.Name: mf4_5
Column.Description: Flux calculation method flag 4.5um IRAC (Band 2) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote2"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 2</a>)

Column.Name: mf5_8
Column.Description: Flux calculation method flag 5.8um IRAC (Band 3) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote2"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 2</a>)

Column.Name: mf8_0
Column.Description: Flux calculation method flag 8.0um IRAC (Band 4) (see <a href="http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/SPITZER/SAGE-SMC/gator_docs/SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions.html#footnote2"> SAGE-SMC_IRAC_colDescriptions footnote 2</a>)

Column.Name: versionNo
Column.Description: Version number assigned by MIPS/IRAC pipeline team

Column.Name: versionDate
Column.Description: Date catalog was produced in the following format, "mon dd yyyy", "Dec 5 2007"

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of unit vector on the unit sphere for ra,dec of this source

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of unit vector on the unit sphere for ra,dec of this source

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of unit vector on the unit sphere for ra,dec of this source

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: The Hierchical Triangular Mesh partition, computed at index level 20, in which this source lies.
